name: Solitaire Classic Patience
description:
Solitaire Classic Patience is the original card game. Play Solitaire just like you remember it!

Solitaire is a popular card game that is also known as Klondike or Patience. The goal is to get all cards, in order, onto one of the four foundation piles. Play as fast and make a new record or take your time and relax!


Features include:
- Play Offline
- Left Handed Mode
- Customize Board Background
- Customize Card Background
- Daily Challenges
- Draw 1 card
- Draw 3 card
- Record keeping
- Undo
- Auto complete
- Lifetime statistics
- Reset lifetime statistics

Scoring
- Off
- Standard
- Vegas
- Timed
